title: Magical colorful cats (hard)
text:
There is a circle of n cats, includes white cats, red cats and green cats. When two cats of different colors talk with each other, they both change to third color. If they have same color, nothing will happen.At each step, the 1stcat talks with 2ndcat, the 2ndcat talks with the 3rdcat,… and the nthcat talks with 1stcat.Given the original color of n cats, your task is find the color of n cats after k steps.InputFirst line : n and k (1 ≤ n ≤ 50000, 1 ≤ k ≤ 109)Second line : n characters, the i-th charater denotes color of the i-th cat at first stateOutputn charaters denotes the color of n cats after k steps.ExampleInput:3 1
GRROutput:RGRInput:5 4
WRWRWOutput:GGGWGNote: Before solving this problem, you may want to tryCOLORCAT
